mapper.select: SELECT id, title, operator_id, event_type, reg_date, from_dt, to_dt, description, place_name, place_addr, create_dt, update_dt, create_user_id, update_user_id FROM event where id = #{value}

SELECT id, title, operator_id, event_type, reg_date, from_dt, to_dt, description, place_name, place_addr, create_dt, update_dt, create_user_id, update_user_id FROM event where title like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{title}, '%')) and from_dt between #{fromFromDate} and #{fromToDate}

SELECT id, title, operator_id, event_type, reg_date, from_dt, to_dt, description, place_name, place_addr, create_dt, update_dt, create_user_id, update_user_id FROM event where 1 = 1
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{title}, '%')
AND from_dt > current_timestamp()
AND current_timestamp() between from_dt and to_dt
AND current_timestamp() > to_dt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (title, operator_id, event_type, reg_date, from_dt, to_dt, description, place_name, place_addr, create_dt, create_user_id) VALUES ( #{title}, #{operatorId}, #{eventType}, #{regDate} , #{fromDt}, #{toDt}, #{description}, #{placeName}, #{placeAddr}, #{createDt}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET title=#{title}, operator_id=#{operator_id}, event_type=#{event_type}, reg_date=#{reg_date}, from_dt=#{from_dt}, to_dt=#{to_dt}, description=#{description}, place_name=#{place_name}, place_addr=#{place_addr}, create_dt='', update_dt=current_timestamp(), create_user_id=0, update_user_id=#{update_user_id}, status_of_event=NULL WHERE id=#{id};
